text:
Hi Team @everyone, The anchor link in the CTA is leading to the previous section instead of the intended one. I'm not sure what's causing this issue. I have a sticky header on the webpage, and I've also tried applying JavaScript for the sticky header. Here’s the code snippet: ```html CTA
``` My header has a total height of 114px, with 40px hidden during scroll and the remaining 74px staying sticky.
Ok yeah I didn’t write it correctly there, but in my code it’s written correctly with that missing end quotation mark included
